name: Time To Feast
description:
Time to Feast is an Action videogame in which you will find yourself playing the role of a vampire.

Your life is at stake: you must escape from a catacomb where you were imprisoned, awaiting for your fate to be decided. You will have to fight your own way through the various rooms, becoming gradually stronger.

Will you manage to find who locked you there and defeat them?

Time To Feast
A game by Hateful Goats 

GAME DESIGNERS
Matteo Palermo
Stefano Schiavolini 

3D ARTIST
Gabriele Musi 

2D/CONCEPT ARTIST
Amaryllis Cancellara (@amaryllismyoart) 

PROGRAMMER
Davide Balan 

VOICE ACTORS
Amaryllis Cancellara (@amaryllismyoart)
Zizou (@tombdude) 

MUSIC BY 
Gabriele Musi
